attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: I thought I would get this app to support our lovely president, BUT once I downloaded the app I got hacked!! All my information was leaked and my phone stopped working. This is the most terrible app that I have ever downloaded. DONT GET IT!!!!

attributes.title: the app was being mean 😭
attributes.review: it was telling me to go back to my Country( i live in the usa btw) and the country is stolen land and the app was treating woman like there objects , the creator of dis app raped some woman actually support that’s its sad...😤the app is slow and gives ur phone a virus 🦠 🖕

attributes.title: Free Barron❤️
attributes.review: This app is horrible!! I wanted to support my future president daddy trump😎😽, but when the app downloaded on my phone, it stank soooo bad. It literally smelled like caca😹. I had no other option but to delete it. It is still stinking up my phone😖.

[Verse]
I was a girl in the village doing alright
Then I became a princess overnight
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right
So much to learn and see
Up in the castle with my new family
In a school that's just for royalty
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me
I'm so excited to be (Sofia the First)
I'm finding out what being royal's all about (Sofia the First)
Making my way, it's an adventure every day (Sofia)
It's gonna be my time (Sofia)
To show them all that I'm Sofia the First

attributes.title: I am LITERALLY DISGUSTED
attributes.review: this app is literally the worst app on the ENTIRE PLANETTTTTT ! It took exactly 4 years to download, when I opened it I SAW AN ORANGE BEING RACIST AND BEING INNAPROPRIATE I THREW UP ! I am over this honey. this is the ghetto, i’m talking white refrigerator... apple take this off the market right now or I will have you shut down

attributes.title: this is horrible
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE once i downloaded it to see what all the negative feedback was about it complexity wiped my phone and sent me back to the set up screen and well here i am now

attributes.title: Awful Experience
attributes.review: This app was so terrible, it contained so much misleading information. I DO NOT RECOMMEND. I had such a horrible experience using this app, and I was not satisfied with the outcome. If I could give this zero stars I would.

attributes.title: beware 😾
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever owned. when i opened the app, it flooded with pictures of lovelypeaches and shane dawson which i DO NOT SUPPORT. i expected to see my beloved cheeto puff but instead i was shocked. please get this app off the app store. it ruined my life. 😿

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: This app caused more people to lose brain cells than drinking and doing meth during pregnancy does. My father saw this app and then straight up died. Wouldn’t recommend. Also no manager to be found 😤

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app caused my skin to break out into a rash. I attempted to open the app itself, but my body just wouldn’t let me. It is the worst app in the world and i wouldn’t suggest this to my worst enemy. I would rate this 0/5 if I could.
